articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Video American father arrested in Turks and Caicos returns home after 102 days - ABC News
articles.description: Bryan Hagerich, an American, avoided a long prison sentence under the strict gun laws of Turks and Caicos. He has returned to the U.S. after paying a fine.
